column5: Are they demanding passports,or will ID work. Just want to go to the casino.
If you cross the border,passport is needed B.

Not sure why you would want to cross to Seneca Niagara Casino, when there is two on this side of the border and quite honestly, Seneca is no worse or no better than Casino Niagara or Fallsview Casino. Not to mention if you win a decent amount in New York State, it can be a real pain in the behind to claim/keep and bring it back to Canada.
